description: I'm a frontend engineer who develops modern, reactive and user friendly web applications using the latest technologies.
I believe a perfect blend of UI architecture is one, where the goals and needs are accounted for in an elegant, efficient and robust design of the UI.
Scroll down to know more about me!

responsibilities: Design and develop new features/requirements by translating given Wire-frames into Web Components that meets markup standards, cross-browser compatibility, usability principles and accessibility.

Develop reusable and modular UI components on React, Tailwind CSS and TypeScript. Define accessibility, governance and rollout the components across the Internal Web Components library. Utilized Storybook to document and test UI components.

Developing a Micro-Frontend based application utilizing WebPack and Module Federation. This Application lets the end user customize their mobile apps flow by toggling the configurations in application and decision making logics.
Ported the Disney+ Hotstar Chromecast receiver application from plain JavaScript to Next.js.
Implemented custom user interactions to the Chromecast application using the Google Cast Application Framework (CAF), which increased user engagement on ChromeCast Application by 18%.
Integrated region-based Chromecast configuration changes and RTL support for the different regions.
Design and develop new features/requirements by translating given Wire-frames into Web Components that meets markup standards, cross-browser compatibility, usability principles and accessibility.
Develop reusable and modular UI components utilizing Preact and Storybook, define accessibility and governance and rollout the components across the Paytm Web Components library.
Enhanced overall web application performance by optimizing the critical rendering path, reducing page load time and improving performance metrics such as FCP, FMP and TTI etc from 82% to 90%.

Handling the interface layer (Backend For Frontend) for integrating/tailoring the distributed multi microservice architecture with the web-application and achieving a combination of static side generation and server side rendering.
Improved web application security by composing middlewareâ€™s to prevent various attacks such as CSRF, XSS, CSP and Click-Jacking etc which diminished the attacks from 7% to 4.2%.
Collaborate with team to design, develop, test and refine expected deliverables that meet the objectives and quality standards across multiple releases.
Designed and developed the Web Application where user can compare and purchase insurance plans for their pets for a pet insurance company, PetPlan.

Ported the frontend of content management system application from JSP pages in Spring framework to React Web Components in MVC architecture for a content engagement platform provider, Naviga which increased the user engagement by 85%.
Developed the coach and student web panel for an internal product, Career Path which helps the employees to track their career progression and schedule meetings with career coaches.
Assisted senior developers in performing code reviews and implementing improvement plans.
Acclimated to new technologies and situations with the vision of providing best customer experience.

educationData.school: Seth Jai Prakash Mukand Lal Institue of Engineering and Technology
Guru Nanak Khalsa Senior Secondary School

awardsData.heading: 30Hacks Hackathon
awardsData.description: Achieved second prize at company wide Hackathon.  Built a Web-Application that predicts the best suitable institute for the students based upon his/her inputs using Machine Learning Model.

awardsData.heading: Rising Star
awardsData.description: Awarded for outstanding performance, rectifying the architectural issues of the product and improving the overall performance of the application.
